dmca.title: BayTSP DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
*Dear Google.com Abuse Department,*



I am the Compliance Administrator for BayTSP and firstly, I wanted to thank
you for your attention to the Notices of Copyright Infringement you have
received from our organization on behalf of our clients. We sincerely
appreciate your time and effort in resolving these matters.



However, I would like to bring your attention to specific copyright
infringing material that appears to be currently hosted by your services and
that is of particular concern to our clients. Included below for your
reference, please find a copy of the original *Copyright Infringement
Notice: 290-12413569 * that was sent to *Google* on *June 24, 2011*. As of
the time of this correspondence, we can confirm that the material in
question is still publicly available at:



https://market.android.com/details?id=com.nd.android.pandatheme.p_starcraft_2_zerg



Upon reviewing our records, we see that *Google* has a history of consistent
compliance with the takedown requests of our clients. *If you could please
assure compliance in this case as well, by expeditiously removing or
disabling access to this website, we and our clients would greatly
appreciate it. *



Alternatively, please let us know what is preventing compliance in this
matter and if there is any additional information that we can provide to
assist you.



Please do not hesitate to contact us should you have any questions or
concerns.



Thank you, in advance, for your prompt attention to this matter. We
appreciate your time and cooperation and look forward to your response.





Justin Haines

Compliance Administrator

BayTSP, Inc.

Direct line: (408) 341-2346

BayTSP: [redacted]

justinha@baytsp.com

www.baytsp.com

* *
*
------------------------------
*

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----

Hash: SHA1



Google



290-12413569

25 Jun 2011 00:19:01 GMT





Dear Sir or Madam:



Blizzard Entertainment, Inc. (Blizzard) is the exclusive owner of
copyrights, trademarks and other proprietary rights in numerous software
properties.



It has come to our attention that Google is the service provider for the IP
address listed below, from which unauthorized copying and distribution
(downloading, uploading, file serving, file "swapping" or other similar
activities) of Blizzard property(s) listed below is taking place.  We
believe that the Internet access of the user engaging in this infringement
is provided by Google or a downstream service provider who purchases this
connectivity from Google.



This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright and or
trademark infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright and Lanham
Acts.  Depending upon the type of service Google is providing to this IP
address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not
expeditiously remove or disable access to the property(s) listed below, or
if it fails to implement a policy that provides for termination of
subscribers who are repeat infringers (see, 17 U.S.C. 512).



Despite the above, Blizzard believes that the entire Internet community
benefits when these matters are resolved cooperatively.  We urge you to take
immediate action to stop this infringing activity and immediately inform us
of the results of your actions.  We appreciate your efforts toward this
common goal.



The undersigned has a good faith belief that use of the property(s) in the
manner described herein is not authorized by Blizzard, its agent or the
law.  The information contained in this notification is accurate.  Under
penalty of perjury, the undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of
Blizzard with respect to this matter.



Please send us a prompt response indicating the actions you have taken to
resolve this matter, making sure to reference the Notice ID number above in
your response.



mailto:activision@copyright-compliance.com?subject=RE%3A%20Copyright%20Infringement%20Notice%20ID%3A%20290%2D12413569<activision@copyright-compliance.com?subject=RE%3A%20Copyright%20Infringement%20Notice%20ID%3A%20290%2D12413569>



If you do not wish to reply by email, please use our Web Interface by
clicking on the following link:



http://webreply.baytsp.com/webreply/webreply.jsp?customerid=290&commhash=cc19450e41681a51a1353c3779c557b0



Note: If your email program has inserted line breaks into either the email
or web links above, you can copy and paste the entire link in to you email
program, or favorite web browser, respectively.



Please be advised that this letter is not and is not intended to be a
complete statement of the facts or law as they may pertain to this matter or
of Blizzard's positions, rights or remedies, legal or equitable, all of
which are specifically reserved.



Regards,



[redacted], Esq.



In-House Counsel

BayTSP.com Inc. - as an Authorized Agent of Activision/Blizzard
Entertainment, Inc.

[redacted] - Los Gatos, CA 95031

Phone:: [redacted] fax:: [redacted]

activision@copyright-compliance.com



*pgp public key is available on the key server at <http://pgp.mit.edu>



Note:  The information transmitted in this Notice is intended only for the
person or entity to which it is addressed and may contain confidential
and/or privileged material.  Any review, reproduction, retransmission,
dissemination or other use of, or taking of any action in reliance upon,
this information by persons or entities other than the intended recipient is
prohibited.  If you received this in error, please contact the sender and
delete the material from all computers.

Evidentiary Information:

Notice ID: 290-12413569

Asset: StarCraft 2

Protocol: Web

IP Address:  74.125.224.41

DNS:

File Name:
https://market.android.com/details?id=com.nd.android.pandatheme.p_starcraft_2_zerg

File Size: 1

Timestamp: 25 Jun 2011 00:13:19 GMT

Last Seen Date: 25 Jun 2011 00:13:19 GMT

URL:
https://market.android.com/details?id=com.nd.android.pandatheme.p_starcraft_2_zerg

Username (if available):

Port ID: 0

Bay ID: |1
